title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 257.20 - Ingredients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 257.20 - Ingredients

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements for commercial feed
otherwise provided in this Part, the following requirements shall apply to pet
food and specialty pet food: (a) The
maximum moisture in any pet food or specialty pet food shall be guaranteed and
shall not exceed 78 percent or the natural moisture content of the constituent
ingredients of the product, whichever is greater. Pet food or specialty pet
food such as those consisting principally of stew, gravy, sauce, broth, juice
or a milk replacer, which are so labeled, may contain moisture in excess of 78
percent. Notes

257.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
